text: Galipea is a genus of plant in family Rutaceae. Species include: * Galipea dasysperma * Galipea granulosa * Galipea longiflora * Galipea ossana, DC. * Galipea panamensis * Galipea trifoliata Galipea officinalis is currently a synonym of Angostura trifoliata. Galipea elegans is a synonym of Conchocarpus elegans. ==References== Category:Rutaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Galipea
